name: The Leela Ambience Convention Hotel, Delhi

address.Street: 1, CBD, Maharaj Surajmal Road Near Yamuna Sports Complex

description: The Leela Ambience Convention Hotel, Delhi is an epitome of luxury with India’s largest convention facility and bears close proximity to Connaught Place and old Delhi monuments. Exhibiting sheer grandeur within its two towers encompassing 480 rooms and suites, two receptions, two temperature controlled swimming pools and gymnasiums, 25,000 square feet of pillar-less ballroom; the hotel boasts of India’s largest meeting space of 70,000 square feet. The 480 rooms are luxuriously appointed, out of which 126 are twin bedded rooms (highest in the country) and 25 are suites. With 45 square meters of area, each room displays state of art technology with four fixture bathrooms. Nestled on National Highway 24, the hotel is the quickest gateway to the Himalayas while Agra is just about a 2.5 hours’ drive. The Leela spoils its patrons with a choice of myriad cuisines through its 3 specialty restaurants, All Day Dine Café Knosh, Oriental Mei Kun & Indian Dilli32, and a regally designed Cherry bar. The restaurants are well equipped to cater to a gathering of above 600 guests simultaneously during breakfast. Taking guest experience to a whole new level, the hotel provides a selection of wellbeing and relaxation offerings in one of the finest spas named Shanaya. The Grand Sapphire Ballroom can accommodate 3500 guests in theater style and seamlessly lends itself into five smaller ballrooms with flexible seating capacities. It is flanked by two beautifully designed outdoor patios, which provide an ideal setting for events. The hotel also has another ballroom, Emerald with separate pre-function area. Besides, it houses 30 breakaway rooms for 4 to 200 guests. The hotel is well equipped to park up to 700 cars within its premises. The two business centers with nine elegantly furnished boardrooms & three meeting rooms further showcase its versatility in business and convention areas.

propertyAmenities: Fitness Centre with Gym / Workout Room
